name: Andrey N. Chernikov
content: Andrey Chernikov's Home Page Andrey Chernikov, Ph.D. Associate Professor Center for Real-Time Computing Department of Computer Science Engineering & Computational Sciences Bldg Suite 3311A Old Dominion University 4700 Elkhorn Ave Norfolk, VA 23529, USA Research interests: Parallel computational geometry with a focus on quality mesh generation Formal methods in parallel mesh generationPublicationsTeaching (various years): CS 600 Algorithms and Data Structures CS 500 Foundations of Computing CS 402/502 Formal Software Foundations CS 486/586 Introduction to Parallel Computing CS 478/578 Computational Geometry, Methods and Applications CS 381 Discrete Structures CS 355 Principles of Programming Langauages CS 333 Programming and Problem Solving in C++ CS 300T Computers in Society CS 121G Introduction to Information Literacy and Research for Scientists
